title: Web developer - CSS nerd
whoText:
I am a Web developer from Ghent, Belgium. I may have grown up bilingual with Dutch and French, but these days I'm fluent in JavaScript and CSSâ€”the only languages where 'style' is both a syntax requirement and a design choice.
Also UI and UX are very important to me. I find it fascinating to create something that is both functional and aesthetically pleasing.
contactText: If you have any questions or would like to work together, please don't hesitate to contact me!
